text.content:
Bent

Your weapon's current Hit Point are reduced to its Broken Threshold. if already broken, the weapon takes [[/r 3d6]] damage, ignoring Hardness.

Melee

Double Miss

If this attack uses ammunition, you use twice the amount of ammunition on this attack.

Ranged

Caught your Attack

This attack grants and triggers a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove} as a reaction by your enemy.

Unarmed

Left Reeling

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Spell
